bibl.title: [Coin Hoards 2007. Ancient Hoards.] Ismant el-Kharab, Ancient Kellis, in the Dakhleh Oasis.
bibl.note: Four fourth-century AD bronze coins, found in a leather pouch in a domestic structure at Ismant el-Kharab, ancient Kellis, in Egypt's Dakhleh Oasis.
bibl.seg: Gillian E. Bowen, [Coin Hoards 2007. Ancient Hoards.] Ismant el-Kharab, Ancient Kellis, in the Dakhleh Oasis.
Four fourth-century AD bronze coins, found in a leather pouch in a domestic structure at Ismant el-Kharab, ancient Kellis, in Egypt's Dakhleh Oasis.
